lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig followed the Los Angeles Dodgers' wishes when he didn't show up to the stadium on Monday before the team departed on its road trip to Colorado, manager Dave Roberts told The Associated Press.

headline.print_headline: Manager: Yasiel Puig Followed Dodgers' Wishes, Stayed Home
headline.main: Manager: Yasiel Puig Followed Dodgers' Wishes, Stayed Home

snippet: Yasiel Puig followed the Los Angeles Dodgers' wishes when he didn't show up to the stadium on Monday before the team departed on its road trip to Colorado, manager Dave Roberts told The Associated Press....
